title: Diamond and Emerald Haar with Pearl Accents: A Timeless Elegance
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Floral motif design with intricately set brilliant-cut diamonds. The centerpiece features a vibrant pear-shaped emerald surrounded by diamond accents. Delicate South Sea pearls dangle gracefully from the lower edge, enhancing its regal appeal. Classic design meets modern aesthetics for a timeless look.
colors: and Cream (pearls). The vibrant green and sparkling white create a striking contrast against the warm gold tone.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Perfect for Muhurtham
or any occasion where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure a dazzling sparkle, while the South Sea pearls add a touch of classic elegance. Its durable construction and refined Hyderabadi polish make it a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations. Symbolizes prosperity, love, and eternal beauty.
